text: (Kanavan manaiviyakiya) iruvarukkul (pinakku erpattu) pirivinai erpattuvitumo enru ninkal ancinal avanutaiya uravinarkalil oruvaraiyum, avalutaiya uravinarkalil oruvaraiyum natuvarkalaka ninkal erpatuttunkal. (Natuvarkalakiya) avviruvarum camatanam erpatutta virumpinal kanavan manaivi ivviruvaraiyum allah orrumaiyakki vituvan. Niccayamaka allah (anaivaraiyum) nankarintavanaka, nanku kavanippavanaka irukkiran
